dialog.text: The bottom half of the image is river. Above it, there is a mountain range that goes from the left to right whose height is about one fifth of the screen.
are there any peaks for the mountains range?
the peak of the mountains is about 3/5 of the whole frame. there are some snow at the peak of the mountain. there is reflection of the mountains on the river.
where are the peak(middle, left, right)? and is the reflection of the mountains ver clear or not?
there are actually 3 mountains: the main one is on the right and with snow on the peak, the 2nd big is on the left and one is behind them. The reflection is clear.
are there any cloud in the sky?
no the sky is clear blue.
are all  three mountains have the same height?
yes, they are about the same height

sunny. the peak of the mountains are at 3/5 of the image. And between the mountain and river, there is a small area of grass (land) separates them in the middle of the image. about 1/8 of the whole image.
May I ask is it river instead of water? because what I tried is river won't have clear reflection, but water will
then do water. I can tell it is a water surface with clear reflection.
